title: Armed robbers place hostages on cars in deadly bank raids in Brazil
content:
1. Armed robbers place hostages on cars in deadly bank raids in Brazil  Guardian News
  2. Brazil bank robbers tie hostages to getaway cars in Araçatuba  BBC News
